attributes.action: Reinstate the Reciprocal Health Agreement between the United Kingdom and the Isle of Man
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Just like the Channel Islands will have to from April 1st 2009, from April 1st 2010 health care in the UK for Manx residents and vice versa will no longer be free, due to the UK governments decision to withdraw from the agreement! This is clearly against the best interests of all the parties involved, and we wish it to be continued, for the mutual benefit of all those on business, holiday, education or any other reason.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to reinstate the Reciprocal Health Agreement between the United Kingdom and the Isle of Man.

Her Majesty's Government has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 


http://www.hmg.gov.uk/epetition-responses/petition-view.aspx?epref=HealthcareIOMUK


Her Majesty's Government
